name: Ironkraft - Road to Hell
description: Ironkraft - Road to Hell is a fast paced 2.5D side-scrolling car-brawler with an alternative World War II story - Zombies, Nazis, Aliens and maximum craziness included! In a post-apocalyptic vehicle driven universe where only a few dare to step on the road, the fate of the world lies in your hands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: AMD Athlon X4 5150 @ 1.6GHz or Intel Core2 Quad Q9500 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 @ 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: AMD Fx X8 8350 @ 4.7 Ghz or Intel Core i7-4790K @ 4.00 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750Ti @ 2GB or AMD GPU Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
